Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes an affordable independent senior housing assistance program
Summary: Establishes an affordable independent senior housing assistance program.
LawCode: Add Art 29-A §1265, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing an affordable independent senior housing assistance program
